flawed_nl_solution:
Three years ago, his sons were 16 - 3 = <<16-3=31>>31 years old.
Three years ago, Beau was 31 + 31 + 31 = <<31+31+31=93>>93 years old.
Today, Beau is 93 + 3 = <<93+3=96>>96 years old.
#### 96

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
